00024 
00025 #include <avr/io.h>
00026 #include <inttypes.h>
00027 #include "transceiver_spi.h"
00028 #include "gyro_spi.h"
00029 
00030 
00031 void write_to_spi( uint8_t spi_adress, uint16_t spi_data )
00032 {
00033         spi_cs( TRANSCEIVER_CS );
00034         PORTB = PORTB & 0xFE;/* activate chipselect (/SS) for SPI: */
00035         spi_adress &= 0x3F; /* mask 2 MSBs of adress to zero */
00036         spi_write_8_nocs( spi_adress ); /* write adress to transceiver */
00037         spi_write_16_nocs( spi_data ); /* write data to transceiver */
00038         PORTB = PORTB | 0x01; /* deactivate /SS, set lowest bit */
00039 }
00040 
00041 uint8_t read_from_spi( uint8_t spi_addr )
00042 {
00043                 uint16_t buf;
00044                 spi_cs( TRANSCEIVER_CS );
00045                 PORTB = PORTB & 0xFE;/* activate chipselect (/SS) for SPI: */
00046                 spi_addr &= 0x3F; /* mask 2 MSBs of adress to zero */
00047                 spi_write_8_nocs( spi_addr );
00048                 buf = spi_write_16_nocs( 0x0000 );
00049                 PORTB = PORTB | 0x01; /* deactivate /SS, set lowest bit */
00050                 return buf;
00051 }
00052 
00053 void write_to_ram( uint8_t spi_addr, tx_packet_t *tx_packet )
00054 {
00055         int n;  
00056         
00057         spi_cs( TRANSCEIVER_CS );
00058         PORTB = PORTB & 0xFE;/* activate chipselect (/SS) for SPI: */
00059         spi_addr &= 0x3F; /* mask 2 MSBs of adress to zero */
00060         
00061         spi_write_8_nocs( spi_addr ); /* write address */
00062 
00063         for( n = 0; n < tx_packet->dataLength; n+=2 )
00064         {
00065                 spi_write_16_nocs( (uint16_t) ((tx_packet->datan[n+1]<<8)|(tx_packet->datan[n])) );                     
00066         }
00067         PORTB = PORTB | 0x01; /* deactivate /SS, set lowest bit */
00068 }
00069 
00070 uint8_t read_from_ram( uint8_t spi_addr, rx_packet_t *rx_packet)
00071 {
00072         int n;
00073         uint16_t buf;
00074                 
00075         spi_cs( TRANSCEIVER_CS );
00076         PORTB = PORTB & 0xFE;/* activate chipselect (/SS) for SPI: */
00077         spi_addr &= 0x3F; /* mask 2 MSBs of adress to zero */
00078         spi_write_8_nocs( spi_addr ); /* write address */
00079         
00080         n = spi_write_8_nocs( 0x00 ); /* discard first byte, as its garbage */
00081         for( n = 0; n < rx_packet->dataLength; n+=2 )
00082         {
00083                 buf = spi_write_16_nocs(0x00);
00084                 rx_packet->datan[n] =   (char)(buf & 0xFF);
00085                 rx_packet->datan[n+1] = (char)(buf>>8);
00086         }
00087         PORTB = PORTB | 0x01; /* deactivate /SS, set lowest bit */
00088         return 1;
00089 }
